description:
I wanted to do this object in RGB  for 2 years now.  There were always problems preventing me from getting at it. Most notably my son's cancer that was diagnosed exactly one year ago today.   I finally did it this past week!   
I will print it and offer him the print to celebrate his remission.


Done in LRGB in -18C temperature (heck it is a winter DSO afterall  :-)

4 hours of Luminance  bin 1X1
40 min of each color binned 2X2
All processed with APP and Photoshop

Enjoy, Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays to every one!
Cheers!
imaging_telescopes: Explore Scientific 80 ED TRIPLET F/6 APO
title: Orion Nebula M42 and Running Man  Sh2-279  LRGB
